about_the_game: Hardcore multiplayer action game with puzzle elements. Players will play for an unusual sphere that looks very attractive and varies depending on the state of the character. The gameplay takes place in a maze, in different modes, at the moment the game has one game mode "Deathmatch" but in the future there will be more. Also in the maze you will be in danger in the form of traps that you can use to achieve victory. Players are available to a variety of modifiers that will improve the parameters of the character such as speed, damage, health, etc.
